A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars The Last Jedi was the most dissapointing sequel in the history of movies. Asides from 2 cool action scenes\, a great soundtrack and nice visuals the movie itself is horrible. Luke Skywalker goes in a horrible direction\, the movie has a lot of misplaced humor\, lots of things set up in episode 7 get tossed aside or solved without giving the viewers any statisfaction. Disney is trying to make it for the general public and insults the fans who hold the franchise dearly. I went out the theater dissapointed and angry\, really don't like how this ended up. Not excited for episode 9 whatsoever.
